author: Andrew Dunn
title: Everything we know about remdesivir, hydroxychloroquine, and 4 other drugs being tested against the coronavirus
description: Repurposing drugs that are designed to treat other conditions is our best near-term hope for finding a COVID-19 treatment. There are dozens of trials right now on a slew of drugs that were originally tested against diseases like Ebola, malaria, HIV, and arthr…
content:
Repurposed drugs are the most promising options for finding a way to treat COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus, in the near term. 
Dozens of clinical trials are enrolling patients and administering a range of drugs originally designed for o… [+10390 chars]
